entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
